queryMap.query: SELECT B.STND_YEAR STND_YEAR ,B.MBR_CD MBR_CD ,B.TMS TMS ,B.DAY_ORD DAY_ORD ,B.RACE_NO RACE_NO ,(SELECT RMK || '경주' FROM TBEA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD ='E00005' AND CD = B.RACE_DGRE_CD) RACE_DGRE_NM ,SUBSTR(B.STRT_TIME,1,2) || ':' || SUBSTR(B.STRT_TIME,3,2) STRT_TIME ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.RACE_DAY),'YYYY-MM-DD') RACE_DAY ,DECODE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.RACE_DAY,'YYYYMMDD'),'D'), '1','일요일', '2','월요일', '3','화요일', '4','수요일', '5','목요일', '6','금요일','토요일') RACE_WEEK ,LAPTIME_1 LAPTIME_1 ,LAPTIME_2 LAPTIME_2 ,LAPTIME_3 LAPTIME_3 ,DECODE(INTRO_NOTI_YN,'Y','공지','미공지') INTRO_NOTI_YN ,DECODE(RANK_NOTI_YN ,'Y','공지','미공지') RANK_NOTI_YN FROM TBEB_RACE_DAY_ORD A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.DAY_ORD = ? AND A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.MBR_CD = B.MBR_CD AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND B.RACE_NO = ?

SELECT A.STND_YEAR STND_YEAR ,A.MBR_CD MBR_CD ,A.TMS TMS ,A.DAY_ORD DAY_ORD ,A.RACE_NO RACE_NO ,DECODE(A.RANK,'','',A.RACE_REG_NO) RACE_REG_NO ,NVL(A.RANK,ROWNUM) RANK ,A.RACE_TM RACE_TM ,A.TIME_DIFF TIME_DIFF ,A.STRATEGY_CD STRATEGY_CD FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR STND_YEAR ,A.MBR_CD MBR_CD ,A.TMS TMS ,A.DAY_ORD DAY_ORD ,A.RACE_NO RACE_NO ,A.RACE_REG_NO RACE_REG_NO ,A.RANK RANK ,A.RACE_TM RACE_TM ,A.TIME_DIFF TIME_DIFF ,A.STRATEGY_CD STRATEGY_CD FROM TBEB_ORGAN A WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.DAY_ORD = ? AND A.RACE_NO = ? ORDER BY A.STND_YEAR ,A.MBR_CD ,A.TMS ,A.DAY_ORD ,DECODE(A.RANK,0,99,A.RANK) ,A.RACE_REG_NO) A

SELECT A.STND_YEAR STND_YEAR ,A.MBR_CD MBR_CD ,A.TMS TMS ,A.DAY_ORD DAY_ORD ,A.RACE_NO RACE_NO ,DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE,'','',A.RACE_REG_NO) RACE_REG_NO ,NVL(A.ENTRY_COURSE,ROWNUM) ENTRY_COURSE ,TO_CHAR(A.STAR_TM ,'00.00') STAR_TM ,A.RMK RMK FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR STND_YEAR ,A.MBR_CD MBR_CD ,A.TMS TMS ,A.DAY_ORD DAY_ORD ,A.RACE_NO RACE_NO ,A.RACE_REG_NO RACE_REG_NO ,A.ENTRY_COURSE ENTRY_COURSE ,A.STAR_TM STAR_TM ,A.RMK RMK FROM TBEB_ORGAN A WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.DAY_ORD = ? AND A.RACE_NO = ? ORDER BY A.STND_YEAR ,A.MBR_CD ,A.TMS ,A.DAY_ORD ,A.RACE_NO ,DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE,0,99,A.ENTRY_COURSE) ,A.RACE_REG_NO) A

SELECT A.STND_YEAR STND_YEAR ,A.MBR_CD MBR_CD ,A.TMS TMS ,A.DAY_ORD DAY_ORD ,A.RACE_NO RACE_NO ,A.RACE_REG_NO RACE_REG_NO ,TO_CHAR(A.INTRO_RUN_TM,'0.00') INTRO_RUN_TM FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR STND_YEAR ,A.MBR_CD MBR_CD ,A.TMS TMS ,A.DAY_ORD DAY_ORD ,A.RACE_NO RACE_NO ,A.RACE_REG_NO RACE_REG_NO ,A.INTRO_RUN_TM INTRO_RUN_TM FROM TBEB_ORGAN A WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.DAY_ORD = ? AND A.RACE_NO = ? ORDER BY A.STND_YEAR ,A.MBR_CD ,A.TMS ,A.DAY_ORD ,A.RACE_NO ,A.RACE_REG_NO ) A

SELECT RACER_NO ,(SELECT NM_KOR FROM TBEC_RACER_MASTER WHERE RACER_NO= TBEB_ORGAN.RACER_NO) RACER_NM FROM TBEB_ORGAN WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? AND RACE_REG_NO = ?

SELECT STND_YEAR ,MBR_CD ,TMS ,DAY_ORD ,RACE_NO ,RACE_REG_NO ,RACER_NO ,(SELECT NM_KOR FROM TBEC_RACER_MASTER WHERE RACER_NO= TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT.RACER_NO) RACER_NM ,SEQ ,RACE_DAY ,CIRCUIT_CNT_CD ,ACDNT_LOC_CD ,VOIL_JO ,VOIL_CD ,ACDNT_TPE_CD ,VOIL_DESC ,RMK ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ,UPDT_ID ,UPDT_DTM ,SANC_ISSUE_NO FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? ORDER BY STND_YEAR ,MBR_CD ,TMS ,DAY_ORD ,RACE_NO ,RACE_REG_NO

SELECT STND_YEAR ,MBR_CD ,TMS ,DAY_ORD ,RACE_NO ,RACE_REG_NO ,RACER_NO ,(SELECT NM_KOR FROM TBEC_RACER_MASTER WHERE RACER_NO= TBED_RACE_ACDNT_STTS.RACER_NO) RACER_NM ,SEQ ,RACE_DAY ,CIRCUIT_CNT_CD ,ACDNT_LOC_CD ,ACDNT_ITEM ,ACDNT_TPE_CD ,ACDNT_DESC ,RMK ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ,UPDT_ID ,UPDT_DTM FROM TBED_RACE_ACDNT_STTS WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? ORDER BY STND_YEAR ,MBR_CD ,TMS ,DAY_ORD ,RACE_NO ,RACE_REG_NO

SELECT STND_YEAR ,MBR_CD ,TMS ,DAY_ORD ,RACE_NO ,FILE_SEQ ,FILE_NAME ,FILE_URL ,FILE_SIZE ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ,UPDT_ID ,UPDT_DTM ,0 AS CHK FROM TBED_RACE_ATTACH WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? ORDER BY STND_YEAR ,MBR_CD ,TMS ,DAY_ORD ,RACE_NO ,FILE_SEQ
SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ)+1,1) SEQ FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? AND RACE_REG_NO = ? AND RACER_NO = ?

INSERT INTO TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT ( STND_YEAR ,MBR_CD ,TMS ,DAY_ORD ,RACE_NO ,RACE_REG_NO ,RACER_NO ,SEQ ,RACE_DAY ,CIRCUIT_CNT_CD ,ACDNT_LOC_CD ,VOIL_JO ,VOIL_CD ,VOIL_DESC ,RMK ,ACDNT_TPE_CD ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ,SANC_ISSUE_NO
) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? )

INSERT INTO TBED_RACE_ACDNT_STTS ( STND_YEAR ,MBR_CD ,TMS ,DAY_ORD ,RACE_NO ,RACE_REG_NO ,RACER_NO ,SEQ ,RACE_DAY ,CIRCUIT_CNT_CD ,ACDNT_LOC_CD ,ACDNT_ITEM ,ACDNT_TPE_CD ,ACDNT_DESC ,RMK ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO TBED_RACE_ATTACH ( STND_YEAR ,MBR_CD ,TMS ,DAY_ORD ,RACE_NO ,FILE_SEQ ,FILE_NAME ,FILE_URL ,FILE_SIZE ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ,UPDT_ID ,UPDT_DTM ) VALUES ( ? --STND_YEAR ,? --MBR_CD ,? --TMS ,? --DAY_ORD ,? --RACE_NO ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(FILE_SEQ),0) + 1 FROM TBED_RACE_ATTACH WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? ) --FILE_SEQ ,? --FILE_NAME ,? --FILE_URL ,? --FILE_SIZE ,? --INST_ID ,SYSDATE --INST_DTM ,? --UPDT_ID ,SYSDATE --UPDT_DTM )
UPDATE TBEB_RACE SET LAPTIME_1 = ? , LAPTIME_2 = ? , LAPTIME_3 = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ?
UPDATE TBEB_ORGAN SET RANK = NVL(?,0) ,RACE_TM = ? ,STRATEGY_CD = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? AND RACE_REG_NO = ?

UPDATE TBEB_ORGAN A SET A. TIME_DIFF = ( SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(TO_CHAR(FLOOR(( (DECODE(LENGTH(A.RACE_TM),6,SUBSTR(A.RACE_TM, 1, 1) * 60000 + SUBSTR(A.RACE_TM, 2, 2) * 1000 + SUBSTR(A.RACE_TM, 4, 3),'000000')) - (DECODE(LENGTH(RACE_TM),6,SUBSTR(RACE_TM, 1, 1) * 60000 + SUBSTR(RACE_TM, 2, 2) * 1000 + SUBSTR(RACE_TM, 4, 3),'000000')) ) /60000),'0')) || TRIM(TO_CHAR(FLOOR((MOD(( (DECODE(LENGTH(A.RACE_TM),6,SUBSTR(A.RACE_TM, 1, 1) * 60000 + SUBSTR(A.RACE_TM, 2, 2) * 1000 + SUBSTR(A.RACE_TM, 4, 3),'000000')) - (DECODE(LENGTH(RACE_TM),6,SUBSTR(RACE_TM, 1, 1) * 60000 + SUBSTR(RACE_TM, 2, 2) * 1000 + SUBSTR(RACE_TM, 4, 3),'000000')) ),60000)) /1000),'00')) || TRIM(TO_CHAR(FLOOR(MOD((MOD(( (DECODE(LENGTH(A.RACE_TM),6,SUBSTR(A.RACE_TM, 1, 1) * 60000 + SUBSTR(A.RACE_TM, 2, 2) * 1000 + SUBSTR(A.RACE_TM, 4, 3),'000000')) - (DECODE(LENGTH(RACE_TM),6,SUBSTR(RACE_TM, 1, 1) * 60000 + SUBSTR(RACE_TM, 2, 2) * 1000 + SUBSTR(RACE_TM, 4, 3),'000000')) ),60000)),1000)),'000')) FROM TBEB_ORGAN WHERE STND_YEAR = A.STND_YEAR AND MBR_CD = A.MBR_CD AND TMS = A.TMS AND DAY_ORD = A.DAY_ORD AND RACE_NO = A.RACE_NO AND RANK IS NOT NULL AND RANK <> 0 AND RANK = (SELECT MAX(RANK) FROM TBEB_ORGAN WHERE STND_YEAR = A.STND_YEAR AND MBR_CD = A.MBR_CD AND TMS = A.TMS AND DAY_ORD = A.DAY_ORD AND RACE_NO = A.RACE_NO AND RANK IS NOT NULL AND RANK <> 0 AND RANK < A.RANK ) ) WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.DAY_ORD = ? AND A.RACE_NO = ?

UPDATE TBEB_ORGAN SET ENTRY_COURSE= NVL(?,0) ,STAR_TM = CASE WHEN INSTR(NVL(?,0),'.') > 0 THEN ? ELSE DECODE(LENGTH(?),NULL,NULL,1,?,2,?,3,?/10, ?/100) END ,RMK = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? AND RACE_REG_NO = ?

UPDATE TBEB_ORGAN SET -- INTRO_RUN_TM = DECODE(LENGTH(?),NULL,NULL,1,?,2,? /10,3,? /100) INTRO_RUN_TM = CASE WHEN INSTR(NVL(?,0),'.') > 0 THEN ? ELSE DECODE(LENGTH(?),NULL,NULL,1,?,2,? /10,3,? /100) END ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? AND RACE_REG_NO = ?

UPDATE TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT SET RACE_DAY = ? ,CIRCUIT_CNT_CD = ? ,ACDNT_LOC_CD = ? ,VOIL_JO = ? ,VOIL_CD = ? ,VOIL_DESC = ? ,RMK = ? ,ACDNT_TPE_CD = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE ,SANC_ISSUE_NO = ? WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? AND RACE_REG_NO = ? AND RACER_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

UPDATE TBED_RACE_ACDNT_STTS SET RACE_DAY = ? ,CIRCUIT_CNT_CD = ? ,ACDNT_LOC_CD = ? ,ACDNT_ITEM = ? ,ACDNT_TPE_CD = ? ,ACDNT_DESC = ? ,RMK = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? AND RACE_REG_NO = ? AND RACER_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
UPDATE TBEB_RACE SET INTRO_NOTI_YN = 'Y' ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ?
UPDATE TBEB_RACE SET RANK_NOTI_YN = 'Y' ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? AND RACE_REG_NO = ? AND RACER_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBED_RACE_ACDNT_STTS WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? AND RACE_REG_NO = ? AND RACER_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBED_RACE_ATTACH WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ? AND FILE_SEQ = NVL(?, FILE_SEQ)
